mapper.sql: pid, serialNo, billNo, proposalCode, projectCode, projectName, num, medicalPrice, ruleName, deductPrice, deductReason, repaymentReason, doctorName, deptCode, deptName,enterHospitalDateStr,outHospitalDateStr,costDateStr, hospitalizedNo, treatmentMode, settlementDateStr, personalNo, insuredName, cardNumber, areaName, versionNumber, backAppeal, typeno, applyDateStr, id, applyDataId, verifyDoctorCode, verifyDoctorName, verifyDeptCode, verifyDeptName, operateReason, operateDate, matchPersonId, matchPersonName, matchDate, reviewerId, reviewerName, reviewerDate, sendPersonId, sendPersonName, sendDate,insuredType,dataType,orderNumber,orderNum,isVerify,isPerson,orderDoctorCode,orderDoctorName,orderDeptCode,orderDeptName, STATE, areaType
mapper.select:
select * from yb_reconsider_verify_view where 1=1 and pid = #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.pid}
and serialNo like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.serialNo} ,'%')
and billNo like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.billNo} ,'%')
and proposalCode like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.proposalCode} ,'%')
and projectCode like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.projectCode} ,'%')
and projectName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.projectName} ,'%')
and ruleName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.ruleName} ,'%')
and deductReason like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.deductReason} ,'%')
and repaymentReason like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.repaymentReason} ,'%')
and doctorName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.doctorName} ,'%')
and deptCode like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.deptCode} ,'%')
and deptName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.deptName} ,'%')
and hospitalizedNo like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.hospitalizedNo} ,'%')
and treatmentMode like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.treatmentMode} ,'%')
and personalNo like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.personalNo} ,'%')
and insuredName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.insuredName} ,'%')
and cardNumber like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.cardNumber} ,'%')
and areaName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.areaName} ,'%')
and versionNumber like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.versionNumber} ,'%')
and backAppeal like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.backAppeal} ,'%')
and typeno =#{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.typeno} and isVerify =#{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.isVerify} and isPerson =#{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.isPerson} and applyDateStr like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.applyDateStr} ,'%')
and applyDataId =#{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.applyDataId}
and verifyDoctorCode like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.verifyDoctorCode} ,'%')
and verifyDoctorName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.verifyDoctorName} ,'%')
and verifyDeptCode like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.verifyDeptCode} ,'%')
and verifyDeptName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.verifyDeptName} ,'%')
and operateReason like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.operateReason} ,'%')
AND ybReconsiderVerifyView.operateDate >= operateDateFrom}
AND ybReconsiderVerifyView.operateDate <= operateDateTo}
and matchPersonName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.matchPersonName} ,'%')
AND ybReconsiderVerifyView.matchDate >= matchDateFrom}
AND ybReconsiderVerifyView.matchDate <= matchDateTo}
and reviewerName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.reviewerName} ,'%')
AND ybReconsiderVerifyView.reviewerDate >= reviewerDateFrom}
AND ybReconsiderVerifyView.reviewerDate <= reviewerDateTo}
and sendPersonName like concat('%', #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.sendPersonName} ,'%')
AND ybReconsiderVerifyView.sendDate >= sendDateFrom}
AND ybReconsiderVerifyView.sendDate <= sendDateTo}
and STATE =#{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.state}

select ad.serialNo, ad.billNo, ad.proposalCode, ad.projectCode, ad.projectName, ad.num, ad.medicalPrice, ad.ruleName, ad.deductPrice, ad.deductReason, ad.repaymentReason, ad.doctorName, ad.deptCode, ad.deptName, ad.enterHospitalDateStr, ad.outHospitalDateStr, ad.costDateStr, ad.hospitalizedNo, ad.treatmentMode, ad.settlementDateStr, ad.personalNo, ad.insuredName, ad.cardNumber, ad.areaName, ad.versionNumber, ad.backAppeal, ad.typeno, ad.insuredType, ad.dataType, ad.orderNumber, ad.orderNum, ra.applyDateStr, case when rv.id is null then UUID() else rv.id end id, ad.id applyDataId, rv.verifyDoctorCode, rv.verifyDoctorName, rv.verifyDeptCode, rv.verifyDeptName, rv.operateReason, rv.operateDate, rv.matchPersonId, rv.matchPersonName, rv.matchDate, rv.reviewerId, rv.reviewerName, rv.reviewerDate, rv.sendPersonId, rv.sendPersonName, rv.sendDate, rv.STATE, case when rv.id is null then '' else rv.orderDoctorCode end orderDoctorCode, case when rv.id is null then '' else rv.orderDoctorName end orderDoctorName, case when rv.id is null then '' else rv.orderDeptCode end orderDeptCode, case when rv.id is null then '' else rv.orderDeptName end orderDeptName, case when rv.id is null then 0 else 1 end isVerify, null isPerson, rv.areaType from yb_reconsider_apply_data ad INNER JOIN yb_reconsider_apply ra ON ra.id = ad.pid LEFT JOIN yb_reconsider_verify rv ON ad.id = rv.applyDataId and rv.applyDateStr=#{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.applyDateStr} and rv.areaType=#{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.areaType} where ad.pid = #{ybReconsiderVerifyView.pid} and ad.typeno = #{ybReconsiderVerifyView.typeno} and ad.dataType = #{ybReconsiderVerifyView.dataType} and ( (rv.id is not null and rv.state = #{ybReconsiderVerifyView.state}) or rv.id is null )

select count(1) from yb_reconsider_verify WHERE applyDateStr= #{ybReconsiderVerifyView.applyDateStr} and areaType = #{ ybReconsiderVerifyView.areaType} and typeno = #{ybReconsiderVerifyView.typeno} and dataType = #{ybReconsiderVerifyView.dataType}
